name: NORIP BVBA
goal:
Norip provides management service for Huvepharma NV located in Belgium.
The managing director Eddy Piron is managing Director for Huvepharma NV. and board member of IFAH (International Federation ANimal Health) based in Brussels; Eddy Piron interacts with the European Parliament Members on matters of the redrafting of new EUveterinary and animal health legislation.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Food Safety, Single market
euInitiatives: - EU animal healt legistlation (veterinary products and feed additives for animals)
